Header: “Bad Boys for Life” scheduled to be theatrically released this month
Content: “Bad Boys for Life” is an upcoming American buddy cop action comedy film directed by Adil El Arbi and Bilall Fallah, produced by Jerry Bruckheimer and Will Smith and starring Smith and Martin Lawrence. The sequel to Bad Boys and Bad Boys II and the third and final installment in the Bad Boys trilogy, the film follows detectives Lowrey and Burnett reuniting once again when a Romanian mob boss exacts revenge on the duo just as they are about to officially retire. Bad Boys for Life is scheduled to be theatrically released in the United States on 17th of this month by Columbia Pictures.
